question: Hello.  I am a 27 year old white female who is overweight (more than 50 lbs) and I just found out that my mother, who is in her mid to late 40s was diagnosed with diabetes.  I am concerned now with my lifestyle (inactive) and her diagnoses that I am likely to develope the disease as well.  Perhaps I could possibly be pre-diabetic even now.  Should I go to a doctor to get a diabetes test?  Should I buy a home kit to monitor my glucose . . . in addition to a change in lifestyle what should I do to prevent a diabetes diagnosis in my near future?Thank you
title: Am I at risk for diabetes, what should I do
